name: Block Jump (Sam Walpole)
description:
My first independent Unity game after completing the excellent Unity Course (https://www.udemy.com/unitycourse2/) from GameDev.tv.

Endless-runner platformer with an '8-bit' styling. Collect yellow pixels to score points.

Works best in full screen so cursor doesn't leave game window.

Controls:

Jump by clicking the mouse.

Jump direction and power (indicated by aimer direction and length) can be changed by moving the mouse. 

***WONT WORK PROPERLY ON MOBILE***
